title: MedCraft appsettings (extended)
description: Core settings for MedCraft application appsettings files. Extends base appsettings.json with additional custom application properties.

UploadScanning.description: Configuration of file upload scanner service

Host.description: Host name of the upload scanner service

Port.description: Port on with the upload scanner service runs

Mode.description: Upload scanning mode. 'DisabledWithWarning' is runtime validated and only allowed in Development Mode. In Production, only 'Required' is allowed.
